abstract: In two early stage studies, Bristol-Myers Squibb’s nivolumab and Merck’s pembrolizumab shrank tumors in patients with Hodgkin’s lymphoma.
snippet: In two early stage studies, Bristol-Myers Squibb’s nivolumab and Merck’s pembrolizumab shrank tumors in patients with Hodgkin’s lymphoma.
lead_paragraph: Drugs that free the body’s immune system to fight cancer have shown strong preliminary results in treating Hodgkin’s lymphoma, shrinking tumors in well over half of patients who had exhausted many other treatment options, researchers reported on Saturday.

headline.main: Cancer Drugs That Free Brake on Immune System Show Promise for Hodgkin’s
headline.print_headline: Cancer Drugs That Free Brake on Immune System Show Promise for Hodgkin’s
